html: This brave #Hoosier was finally found &is being brought home after 76 years. Today, Private Fred Evert Freet was laid to rest &his family is able to get the closure they so rightfully deserve.
text: This brave #Hoosier was finally found &is being brought home after 76 years. Today, Private Fred Evert Freet was laid to rest &his family is able to get the closure they so rightfully deserve.

html: In 2015, new sets of human remains were recovered on the island in an undiscovered cemetery. After intensive testing & investigating, the United States Navy positively identified one set of remains as Private Freet on August 6, 2018.
text: In 2015, new sets of human remains were recovered on the island in an undiscovered cemetery.  After intensive testing & investigating, the United States Navy positively identified one set of remains as Private Freet on August 6, 2018.

html: Several of our soldiers were buried on Betio Island & the United States Military recovered the remains of as many American casualties they could locate. Decades passed & there was still no sign of Private Freet’s remains.
text: Several of our soldiers were buried on Betio Island & the United States Military recovered the remains of as many American casualties they could locate. Decades passed & there was still no sign of Private Freet’s remains.

html: In 1943, Fred Evert Freet paid the ultimate sacrifice at the young age of 18, serving his country during WWII at the Battle of Tarawa on Betio Island. This honorable Marine was not officially declared killed in action &his remains deemed unrecoverable until 1949.pic.twitter.com/d9NBYeMatB
text: In 1943, Fred Evert Freet paid the ultimate sacrifice at the young age of 18, serving his country during WWII at the Battle of Tarawa on Betio Island. This honorable Marine was not officially declared killed in action &his remains deemed unrecoverable until 1949.pic.twitter.com/d9NBYeMatB

html: While the U.S. has been the global leader in efforts to expand & improve educational opportunities, particularly for girls, there is still more work to be done to ensure access to quality education & expand girls’ economic futures.

html: Adolescent girls who remain in school are more likely to live longer, marry later & earn an income to support their families, thus helping the economic prosperity of their communities & nations. However, today +130 million girls worldwide are not in school.
text:
Adolescent girls who remain in school are more likely to live longer, marry later & earn an income to support their families, thus helping the economic prosperity of their communities & nations. 

However, today +130 million girls worldwide are not in school.

html: But now, Democrats refuse to condemn, by name, a Democrat who has repeatedly made anti-Semitic statements. This is hypocritical and unacceptable.

html: Earlier this year, the House voted to condemn a Republican, by name, who made remarks supporting white supremacy and white nationalism. At that time, I applauded the decision by Republican leadership to remove Rep. Steve King from his cmte assignments b/c of his bigoted comments.

html: Indiana has been fortunate & has not had any cases reported this year, but #Hoosiers still run the risk of being exposed to such a disease. Measles vaccines have saved more than 20 million lives throughout the world since 2000.
text: Indiana has been fortunate & has not had any cases reported this year, but #Hoosiers still run the risk of being exposed to such a disease. Measles vaccines have saved more than 20 million lives throughout the world since 2000.

html: Measles is a highly contagious, airborne virus that can lead to serious respiratory illnesses & can become life-threatening. Just this year, there have been reports of 127 individual measles cases throughout 10 states.
text: Measles is a highly contagious, airborne virus that can lead to serious respiratory illnesses & can become life-threatening.  Just this year, there have been reports of 127 individual measles cases throughout 10 states.

html: I support the President’s national emergency declaration designed to strengthen our borders with additional border barrier systems as quickly and efficiently as possible.
text: I support the President’s national emergency declaration designed to strengthen our borders with additional border barrier systems as quickly and efficiently as possible.

html: There are already over 650 miles of barriers in place at the southern border. Apprehensions of people trying to illegally enter our country at these barrier locations have gone down dramatically.
text: There are already over 650 miles of barriers in place at the southern border. Apprehensions of people trying to illegally enter our country at these barrier locations have gone down dramatically.

html: Strong borders must be in place in order to keep the American people safe and the situation at our southern border can no longer be ignored.
text: Strong borders must be in place in order to keep the American people safe and the situation at our southern border can no longer be ignored.

html: While this is a humanitarian crisis that must be handled with compassion, this ongoing problem is overwhelming our resources to adequately address thousands upon thousands of people, particularly of children, who are coming to our border.
text: While this is a humanitarian crisis that must be handled with compassion, this ongoing problem is overwhelming our resources to adequately address thousands upon thousands of people, particularly of children, who are coming to our border.

html: As I witnessed during my trip to the Texas border last year, we are seeing floods of families and unaccompanied children reaching our southern border in an attempt to illegally enter the Unites States.
text: As I witnessed during my trip to the Texas border last year, we are seeing floods of families and unaccompanied children reaching our southern border in an attempt to illegally enter the Unites States.

html: The resolution the House passed today to end the President’s national emergency declaration undermines the statutory powers granted by Congress to the President to declare national emergencies.
text: The resolution the House passed today to end the President’s national emergency declaration undermines the statutory powers granted by Congress to the President to declare national emergencies.

html: Congress gave the President statutory authority to declare national emergencies. When Congress did so, they did not specifically define what can be designated as a ‘national emergency’ or not.
text: Congress gave the President statutory authority to declare national emergencies. When Congress did so, they did not specifically define what can be designated as a ‘national emergency’ or not.

html: “I don’t think people appreciate the true human crisis at the border,” Brooks said. “It’s horrible what is happening. We have to discourage people from making the trek in the first place, and bringing so many children.”
text: “I don’t think people appreciate the true human crisis at the border,” Brooks said. “It’s horrible what is happening. We have to discourage people from making the trek in the first place, and bringing so many children.”

html: Thanks @SusanWBrooks for your bipartisan work on H.R. 269, the Pandemic and All-Hazards Preparedness and Advancing Innovation Act of 2019. The bill, authored by Rep. Anna Eshoo (D-CA) and Rep. Susan Brooks (R-IN), passed the House by a vote of 401-17.
text: Thanks @SusanWBrooks for your bipartisan work on H.R. 269, the Pandemic and All-Hazards Preparedness and Advancing Innovation Act of 2019. The bill, authored by Rep. Anna Eshoo (D-CA) and Rep. Susan Brooks (R-IN), passed the House by a vote of 401-17.

html: Thanks to @RepAnnaEshoo, @SusanWBrooks and all of the 401 Members of Congress who voted to successfully pass PAHPA reauthorization!! Yesterday, we sent a letter (along w/the @USChamber) to Congress outlining the importance of PAHPA. You can read it here:https://www.allianceforbiosecurity.com/chamber
text: Thanks to @RepAnnaEshoo, @SusanWBrooks and all of the 401 Members of Congress who voted to successfully pass PAHPA reauthorization!! Yesterday, we sent a letter (along w/the @USChamber) to Congress outlining the importance of PAHPA. You can read it here:https://www.allianceforbiosecurity.com/chamber

html: PAHPA was first signed into law in 2006, & I'm proud this reauthorization bill reflects extensive feedback from medical & public health preparedness & response stakeholders so we can better prepare for & combat the known threats of today & the unknown threats of tomorrow.
text: PAHPA was first signed into law in 2006, & I'm proud this reauthorization bill reflects extensive feedback from medical & public health preparedness & response stakeholders so we can better prepare for & combat the known threats of today & the unknown threats of tomorrow.

html: #PAHPA improves our federal response to public health & national security threats by working to close the gaps in our emergency preparedness & response plans - ensuring we have more medical professionals trained & equipment, such as hazmat suits, masks & vaccines available.pic.twitter.com/LVb5sxyc2E
text: #PAHPA improves our federal response to public health & national security threats by working to close the gaps in our emergency preparedness & response plans - ensuring we have more medical professionals trained & equipment, such as hazmat suits, masks & vaccines available.pic.twitter.com/LVb5sxyc2E

html: Biological threats, such as Ebola, smallpox or the anthrax attacks after September 11, 2001, can devastate communities, whether occurring naturally or manufactured into weapons of mass destruction by nation states or terrorist organizations.
text: Biological threats, such as Ebola, smallpox or the anthrax attacks after September 11, 2001, can devastate communities, whether occurring naturally or manufactured into weapons of mass destruction by nation states or terrorist organizations.

html: Some of the nation’s largest vehicle fleets recycle used oil for re-refining & procure re-refined oil, including the Department of Defense, U.S. Postal Service, National Park Service, & state & local authorities.
text: Some of the nation’s largest vehicle fleets recycle used oil for re-refining & procure re-refined oil, including the Department of Defense, U.S. Postal Service, National Park Service, & state & local authorities.

html: Americans daily operate motor vehicles that rely on lubricated oil to run safely & efficiently. Our country is already re-refining lubricated oil through a process which rids the oil of harmful contaminants & restores the oil to its original effectiveness.
text: Americans daily operate motor vehicles that rely on lubricated oil to run safely & efficiently. Our country is already re-refining lubricated oil through a process which rids the oil of harmful contaminants & restores the oil to its original effectiveness.

html: PASSES SENATE: I'm proud my #bipartisan re-refining bill is on its way to be signed into law. We need an up-to-date report from the DoE that'll allow Congress to better develop energy saving & environmentally conscious policy in connection w/how we use & reuse lubricating oil.
text: PASSES SENATE: I'm proud my #bipartisan re-refining bill is on its way to be signed into law. We need an up-to-date report from the DoE that'll allow Congress to better develop energy saving & environmentally conscious policy in connection w/how we use & reuse lubricating oil.

html: I am pleased we have made much-needed improvements to the way Congress combats & responds to sexual harassment & retaliation in the House & Senate. Importantly, this bill guarantees taxpayer dollars will no longer be spent to settle sexual harassment or retaliation claims.
text: I am pleased we have made much-needed improvements to the way Congress combats & responds to sexual harassment & retaliation in the House & Senate. Importantly, this bill guarantees taxpayer dollars will no longer be spent to settle sexual harassment or retaliation claims.

html: The late President George H.W. Bush will lie in state in the U.S. Capitol Rotunda beginning with an arrival ceremony on Monday at 5:00 p.m. ET. The public is invited to pay their respects from Monday, December 3 at 7:30 p.m. ET until Wednesday, December 5 at 7:00 a.m. ET.
text: The late President George H.W. Bush will lie in state in the U.S. Capitol Rotunda beginning with an arrival ceremony on Monday at 5:00 p.m. ET. The public is invited to pay their respects from Monday, December 3 at 7:30 p.m. ET until Wednesday, December 5 at 7:00 a.m. ET.

html: Reforms to the Congressional Accountability Act of 1994 are sorely needed to protect the integrity of and public confidence in Congress, to ensure that the legislative branch remains a place where men and women want to serve, and to improve accountability on these vital issues.
text: Reforms to the Congressional Accountability Act of 1994 are sorely needed to protect the integrity of and public confidence in Congress, to ensure that the legislative branch remains a place where men and women want to serve, and to improve accountability on these vital issues.

html: Members and employees alike should be able to work free from sexual harassment or discrimination of any kind. The American public must also have confidence that we in Congress not only view these issues with the seriousness they demand – but that we are taking action.
text: Members and employees alike should be able to work free from sexual harassment or discrimination of any kind. The American public must also have confidence that we in Congress not only view these issues with the seriousness they demand – but that we are taking action.

html: Proud to join the entire Ethics Cmte to send this letter to House & Senate leaders urging passage of legislation to reform the Congressional Accountability Act (CAA), which would strengthen workplace rights & protections for employees in the leg. branch & hold Members accountablepic.twitter.com/wcZ6TeZR6w

html: I am proud #PAHPA reflects extensive feedback from the full range of medical & public health preparedness & response stakeholders in order to best examine our response as a nation to threats & to ensure we have clear procedures, resources & support in place to keep Americans safe

html: Importantly, #PAHPA establishes new advisory groups focused on protecting vulnerable populations such as senior citizens & people w/disabilities during #publichealth threats & emergencies. It also reauthorizes the advisory committee focusing on the specific needs of children.
text: Importantly, #PAHPA establishes new advisory groups focused on protecting vulnerable populations such as senior citizens & people w/disabilities during #publichealth threats & emergencies. It also reauthorizes the advisory committee focusing on the specific needs of children.

html: #PAHPA is a #bipartisan bill that ensures our #healthcare professionals are trained to respond to possible pandemic outbreaks. It prioritizes the further development of our national stockpile of vaccines, basic medical equipment like gloves, hazmat suits & masks, & diagnostics.
text: #PAHPA is a #bipartisan bill that ensures our #healthcare professionals are trained to respond to possible pandemic outbreaks. It prioritizes the further development of our national stockpile of vaccines, basic medical equipment like gloves, hazmat suits & masks, & diagnostics.

html: The Law Enforcement Mental Health & Wellness Act: makes grants available to initiate peer mentoring pilot programs develops training for #mentalhealth providers specific to law enforcement mental health needs studies effectiveness of hotlines & annual mental health checks
text:
The Law Enforcement Mental Health & Wellness Act:
makes grants available to initiate peer mentoring pilot programs
develops training for #mentalhealth providers specific to law enforcement mental health needs
studies effectiveness of hotlines & annual mental health checks

html: We place so much emphasis & attention on our officers’ physical fitness, but we need to do more to ensure they are mentally healthy as well. I'm proud a bill I intro'd in the House, H.R. 2228, the Law Enforcement #MentalHealth & Wellness Act, was signed into law this year.

html: The Veterans TEST Accessibility Act ensures our #veterans are prepared for a wide variety of career paths upon returning home from deployment by making it easier to enhance their education, build a career & provide a better life not only for themselves but for their families.
text: The Veterans TEST Accessibility Act ensures our #veterans are prepared for a wide variety of career paths upon returning home from deployment by making it easier to enhance their education, build a career & provide a better life not only for themselves but for their families.

html: The Veterans TEST Accessibility Act provides our #veterans simpler, fairer access to tests, like the SAT & certifications, like certifications for mechanics, firefighters & realtors, so they can compete in today’s job market after serving our country
text: The Veterans TEST Accessibility Act provides our #veterans simpler, fairer access to tests, like the SAT & certifications, like certifications for mechanics, firefighters & realtors, so they can compete in today’s job market after serving our country

html: Veterans should always have access to the education benefits they've earned. I introduced the #VeteransTESTAct, which was signed into law as part of the #ForeverGIBill, giving #veterans simpler & fairer access to tests & certifications so they can compete in today’s job market.
text: Veterans should always have access to the education benefits they've earned. I introduced the #VeteransTESTAct, which was signed into law as part of the #ForeverGIBill, giving #veterans simpler & fairer access to tests & certifications so they can compete in today’s job market.

html: One Year Ago Today: The #ForeverGIBill was signed into law. There are over a half million #veterans in Indiana. They must be properly compensated & cared for, & that includes guaranteeing access to important benefits & services that support assimilation into civilian life.
text:
One Year Ago Today: The #ForeverGIBill was signed into law. 
There are over a half million #veterans in Indiana. They must be properly compensated & cared for, & that includes guaranteeing access to important benefits & services that support assimilation into civilian life.

html: 3.7 million American jobs have been created since November 2016 — 1 million of those since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct became law. In addition to unemployment numbers being at their lowest point in decades, job openings are at a record high — 213,000 jobs were added in June alone.
text: 3.7 million American jobs have been created since November 2016 — 1 million of those since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct became law. In addition to unemployment numbers being at their lowest point in decades, job openings are at a record high — 213,000 jobs were added in June alone.

html: .@SusanWBrooks joins 41 House members asking the Trump administration to clarify their policies and procedures on separating immigrant families. "Many questions still remain surrounding the policies of taking children from their parents at the border," Brooks said.
text:
.@SusanWBrooks joins 41 House members asking the Trump administration to clarify their policies and procedures on separating immigrant families. 

"Many questions still remain surrounding the policies of taking children from their parents at the border," Brooks said.

html: While I am in support of defending our nation’s borders and am encouraged by the President’s recent executive order, many questions still remain surrounding the policies of taking children from their parents at the border. I look forward to the Administration’s timely response.
text: While I am in support of defending our nation’s borders and am encouraged by the President’s recent executive order, many questions still remain surrounding the policies of taking children from their parents at the border. I look forward to the Administration’s timely response.

html: Devastatingly, 1,526 #Hoosiers died from an opioid overdose in 2016. More than 2 million people in our country will suffer from addiction to opioids in 2018. Visit http://opioidcrisis.gop  to learn more about the actions Congress is taking to combat this deadly epidemic.

html: Almost every person knows someone who has been affected by the #opioidcrisis. Whether it’s prescription pain relievers, heroin, or synthetic opioids such as fentanyl, this crisis continues to worsen. The bills we’re voting on this week brings the victims & their families relief.
text: Almost every person knows someone who has been affected by the #opioidcrisis. Whether it’s prescription pain relievers, heroin, or synthetic opioids such as fentanyl, this crisis continues to worsen. The bills we’re voting on this week brings the victims & their families relief.

html: Yesterday, the House began its 2week long consideration of dozens of bills to combat the #opioidcrisis. So far, we have passed bills that approach ending this deadly epidemic a number of ways. To see a list of the bills & more info, click here>> https://energycommerce.house.gov/news/press-release/house-passes-25-bills-to-combat-the-opioid-crisis/ …

html: This week, we are voting on the most significant congressional reforms against a single drug crisis in history. Bipartisan legislation to: Establish more recovery centers Change how pills are prescribed Encourage non-opioid treatments and much, much more.
text:
This week, we are voting on the most significant congressional reforms against a single drug crisis in history. Bipartisan legislation to:
 Establish more recovery centers
 Change how pills are prescribed
 Encourage non-opioid treatments
and much, much more.

html: This bill reauthorizes funding for the Poison Center Network. Specially trained physicians, nurses & pharmacists answer calls 24/7, 365 days a year from the public, hospital emergency departments, pharmacists, law enforcement & more >>https://susanwbrooks.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/brooks-bipartisan-poison-control-bill-to-combat-the-opioid-epidemic …

html: The Poison Center Network Enhancement Act passes the House. Poison Control Centers are essential to combating the #opioidcrisis. They compile data that can be used to discover hotspots for opioid abuse & alert impacted communities so they can appropriately address the situationpic.twitter.com/ej4jtIlAPq

Bill Info: https://www.congress.gov/bill/115th-congress/house-bill/5329 …

html: The House will soon consider HR5329, the Poison Center Network Enhancement Act, which will reauthorize the national network of Poison Control Centers. They offer free, confidential & expert medical advice 24/7 & their data can be used to identify hotspots for opioid abuse/misuse.pic.twitter.com/trHC7BDdOL
text: The House will soon consider HR5329, the Poison Center Network Enhancement Act, which will reauthorize the national network of Poison Control Centers. They offer free, confidential & expert medical advice 24/7 & their data can be used to identify hotspots for opioid abuse/misuse.pic.twitter.com/trHC7BDdOL
